biotools.summary: Tool for designing DNA vaccines that includes steps for chosing a suitable expression vector, ensuring optimal expression by codon optimization, engineering CpG motifs for enhancing immune responses, and providing additional sequence signals for efficient translation. It also allows to include restriction enzyme mapping and design of primers spanning user specified sequences.

bioschemas.name: DyNAVacS
